verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: said] [ARG1: Kim Jong Un “ reaffirmed ” a commitment to denuclearize North Korea] , but Kim made no specific commitment to relinquish his nuclear arms and ballistic missiles .

President Donald Trump said [ARG0: Kim Jong Un] “ [V: reaffirmed] ” [ARG1: a commitment to denuclearize North Korea] , but Kim made no specific commitment to relinquish his nuclear arms and ballistic missiles .

President Donald Trump said Kim Jong Un “ reaffirmed ” a commitment to [V: denuclearize] [ARG1: North Korea] , but Kim made no specific commitment to relinquish his nuclear arms and ballistic missiles .

President Donald Trump said Kim Jong Un “ reaffirmed ” a commitment to denuclearize North Korea , but [ARG0: Kim] [V: made] [ARG1: no specific commitment to relinquish his nuclear arms and ballistic missiles] .

President Donald Trump said Kim Jong Un “ reaffirmed ” a commitment to denuclearize North Korea , but Kim made no specific commitment to [V: relinquish] [ARG1: his nuclear arms and ballistic missiles] .
